Effect: Chained Spear hurls 2 additional spears.
Chained Spear now marks enemies for X seconds and heals you for Y% of the damage it causes to marked enemies.
Cleave damage increased by 10%.
Cleave now strikes in a full circle around you.
Enemies killed by Cleave will explode, inflicting X damage on all nearby enemies.
Demoralize duration increased by 30%.
Movement speed increased by 15% while Frenzy is at its maximum stacks.
When Frenzy is fully stacked, each attack unleashes X damage to all enemies in front of you. Cannot occur more often than once every Y seconds.

Grab now causes you to charge forward and grab the first enemy you hit. If you successfully grab an enemy, you will carry them for a short distance, damaging enemies you run though, before leaping into the air and slamming them into the ground, damaging and Slowing nearby enemies.
Hammer of the Ancients is now also electrified, slowing enemy movement by 50% for 2 seconds.
The range and damage of Hammer of the Ancients can now be increased by charging it up.
Hammer of the Ancients damage increased by 10%.
Hammer of the Ancients now throws a giant hammer that damages enemies in its path and knocks them away. Picking up this hammer will reduce the remaining cooldown on Hammer of the Ancients
Hammer of the Ancients now summons a Spirit of the Ancients who stuns all nearby enemies and then fights beside you for you for a while.
Hammer of the Ancients now randomly drops hammers in the targeted area multiple times.
Lacerate now inflicts Bleeding that deals X damage over 3 seconds.
Leap causes the ground to shake where you land, dealing X damage to all enemies in the area over 3 seconds.
Whirlwind radius increased, but Whirlwind movement speed decreased.
Whirlwind now also inflics a stacking Chill.
Wrath of the Berserker now increases Critical Hit Chance instead of Attack Speed.
Whirlwind now draws on the power of the wind to deal increased damage, while no longer reducing your Movement Speed.
Wrath of the Berserker now causes nearby enemies to Burn.
Hammer of the Ancients damage increased by X% against Stunned enemies.
Hammer of the Ancients now strikes the ground multiple times, knocking enemies up into the air with each strike, but your movement speed is greatly decreased during the assault.
Chained Spear now hurls a harpoon that knocks enemies away, damaging and Stunning them.
Chained Spear now hurls a flaming spear that damages all enemies in its path and leaves a Burning trail.
Chained Spear now hurls an electrified spear that damages and immobilizes all enemies in its path.
Chained Spear now hurls giant rocks, inflicting damage on all enemies in its path.
Cleave range increased by 20%.
Demoralize is replaced with a war cry that increases all damage you and nearby allies inflict
Demoralize is replaced with a terrifying roar that damages all nearby enemies and Immobilizes them
Demoralize is replaced with an intimidating shout that damages nearby enemies and decreases attack and movement speed.
Furious Charge can now be charged up to increase range and damage.
Furious Charge now charges to a location, damaging all nearby enemies and knocking them into the air. Also increases maximum charges to 2.
All damage you deal is increased by 10% after activating Furious Charge.
Furious Charge creates shock waves when colliding with walls, dealing X damage to nearby enemies and Stunning them for Y seconds.
Ground Stomp now affects all nearby enemies and can be charged to increase range and damage.
Ground Stomp now produces an earthquake, continually damaging enemies in the area but no longer stunning them.
Ground Stomp range increased by 20%.
Ground Stomp now rips open the ground, dealing damage to enemies in front of you. Maximum X charges.

Leap can now charge up to increase range and damage.
Leap damage increased by 10%.

Whirlwind occasionally throws out tornadoes that deal X damage to any enemies they strike.

Whirlwind damage increased by 10%.

Whirlwind damage increased by 10% for each Bleed on the enemy, up to a maximum of 30%.

Condemn damage increased by X% for every enemy hit, up to a maximum of Y% increased damage.

Falling Sword instead unleashes a shock wave that can be charged up to increase range and damage.
Falling Sword instead causes you to surge forward with your sword up to three times, damaging all enemies in your path.
Falling Sword now chains enemies to a location, and pulls them to you when activated again.

Sacred Fire now also hurls waves of flame, dealing x damage to all enemies in their path.
Shield Glare now consumes energy to reflect a beam of light that continually damages enemies in a direction, but no longer Blinds enemies.

Sweep Attack now pulls all enemies it strikes to you.
Sweep Attack now consumes energy to continually damage all nearby enemies while you move.
Sweep Attack now strikes all nearby enemies.

Condemn now continuously drags enemies toward you.
Condemn radius increased by 20%
Condemn now calls down a thunderbolt from the heavens to a targeted location, dealing continuous damage.
Conjuration of Light lasts longer and protects you and your allies within an area,
Conjuration of Light surrounds you and your allies with holy fire that continually damages all nearby enemies, but no longer prevents damage.

Teleport can now be recast, transporting you back to your original location.
Teleport now also removes the last harmful effect applied to you.
Teleport also increases your damage by 10% for three seconds.
Ice Armor also causes your Primary Attacks to decrease enemy Movement Speed by 40% for three seconds.
Arcane Torrent also fires tracking missiles that seek out enemies, dealing damage.
Lightning Nova now conjures a lightning orb that orbits you, firing chain lightning at your target when you use your Primary Attack.
Meteor now deals X% increased damage to Frozen targets.
Meteor now calls down a blizzard that continually damages and Chills enemies in the area.
Ice Armor now also reduces damage you take by X%.
Slow Time now blocks all enemy projectiles from entering or exiting.
Frenzied Finale: Zephyrs now last for 1.5 seconds, but when they dissipate they charge into enemies and explode dealing 120% + 62 damage to all nearby enemies
All Zephyr damage is increased by 28.5%
Mist-touched Orbs also increase your Attack & Movement speed by 28.5% for 4 seconds
Mist-touched cooldown is reduced by 0.95s for every Skill you cast
Zephyrs now also increase your Attack Speed by 13.3% for each you control

When a Zephyr dissipates, it no longer creates a Mist-touched Orb and instead leaves behind a Tide Pool. Dealing lightning damage within the pool will electrify it , dealing an additional 91% + 47 damage to all enemies within the pool
Wave Edge also conjures a Zephyr for 1.5 seconds after striking the same enemy 4 times
The final attack og a Wave Edge series calls down lightning on the enemy dealing 66% + 309 lightning damage
Wave Edge knocks an enemy airborne every 3 hits. Cannot occur to the same enemy player more than once every 4 seconds.
Wave Edge increases your Primary Attack Speed by 9,5% for 3 seconds when it deals damage, up to a maximum of 28,5%.
Effect

Wind Edge becomes empowered every 6 seconds , causing your next attack to unleash a piercing wind that slices through enemies dealing 43% + 235 damage and shattering their armor, causing them to take 19% increased damage for 3 seconds
WInd Edge Critical Hits also shatter the enemies armor, increasing all Critical Hit Damage they take by 34.5% for 2 seconds
Wind Edge becomes empowered when you use a Skill, causing your next 2 Primary Attacks to deal 60% + 326 additional damage to nearby enemies

Wind Edge becomes empowered after using 3 skills, causing your next Primary Attack to release a rending gust, dealing 42% + 225 damage and causing enemies to bleed for 16% + 87 damage per second over 4 seconds
When Wind Edge damages an enemy below 50% life, its rush cooldown is reduced to 1,5 seconds
Surfing Zephyrs: Breaker now conjures 2 Zephyrs to ride the wave dealing 87% + 468 damage to enemies in their path
Galebreaker: Breaker now causes you to dash forward, leaving a Zephyr in your wake and dealing 64% + 347 damage to enemies in your path. You also gain a shield that absorbs 194% + 1054 damage
Twin Break: Breaker now conjures 2 Zephyrs that crash together on waves dealing 87% + 1225 damage and knocking back enemies in their path
Breaking Stride: Breaker now causes you to dash forward, dealing 99% + 1409 damage and knocking back enemies in your path while also conjuring a Zephyr at your destination

Levee Breaker: Breaker now makes you untargetable as you dash on a wave, dealing 80% + 1129 damage to enemies along your path and conjuring a Zephyr. The skill can be used again within 3 seconds without consuming a charge

Ebb and Flow: Breaker now causes you to conjure a Zephyr at your current location and then causes you to rush in a targeted direction, increasing your damage done by 40% for 3 seconds. Using Breaker again, exiting the area or letting the effect expire returns you to your original location
Breaker cooldown is reduced by 18.6%
Breaker maximum charges are increased by 1.
Breaker also increases your damage by 19% for 4s
Breaker Cooldown is reduced by 0.16 seconds for every enemy you damage up to a maximum of 1,6 seconds
Breaker also grants you a shield for 2 seconds, that absorbs 100% + 926 damage and makes you immune to the next loss of control effect you would suffer
Effect
Incessant Wind: Crosswind now empowers your edges with wind for 6 seconds, causing you and your Zephyrs Primary Attacks to unleash wind blades, dealing 42% + 585 damage

Dust Devil: Crosswinds is now channeled for up to 4 seconds and can be cast while moving, causing you and your Zephyrs to spin launching wind blades every 0,3 seconds at up to 5 nearby enemies, dealing 57% + 814 damage
Heavy Winds: Crosswinds now causes you and your Zephyrs to launch wind blades dealing 117% + 1610 damage while also slowing enemies , reducing their movement speed by 70% for 4 seconds

Crossfire: Crosswind now dashes forward firing 3 wind blades at nearby enemies that each deal 48% + 676 damage. The dash distance and the amount of wind blades increases as your movement speed increases. Every 10% increase grants an additional lade up to a maximum of 5.

Shredwinds: Crosswinds now empowers you, causing your next Primary Attack to unleash a flurry of 5 wind blades each dealing 64% + 907 damage and shattering armor (3s?), increasing your damage against the affected enemy by 8% stacking up to 5 times
Crosswinds Critical Hits cause 4 blades of wind to shatter off the target dealing 45% + 416 damage to enemies they hit. Cannot occur more often than once every 0.5 seconds
Crosswinds also causes enemies to bleed dealing 16% + 225 damage for 5s
Crosswinds also increases the damage of your next skill by 48% for 4 seconds
Crosswinds also increase your Primary Attack Speed by 38% for 3 seconds

Watersprout: Vortex now conjures a waterspout at a target location for 5 seconds, continually dealing 65% + 910 damage to enemies while pulling them towards the center. Enemies successfully pulled to the center are knocked into the air. Cannot knockup the same enemy more than once every 3 seconds.

Swirling Chaos: Vortex now causes geysers to erupt from the ground underneath random enemies every second, dealing 143% + 2032 damage and knocking them into the air. Cannot knockup the same enemy more than once every 4 seconds.
Vortex also increases your Primary Attack Speed by 28,5% for 3s after hitting an enemy
Vortex also shatters enemy armor, increasing the damage they take by up to 28.5% for 3 seconds
Gale Force: Squall is now channeled causing you and your Zephyrs to periodically unleash wind slashes dealing 67% + 945 damage to enemies in their path

Intangible Gale: Squall now makes you untargetable and causes you and your Zephyrs to Dash forward, damaging enemies in your path. Additionally, each active Zephyr that Dashes with you will increase your Primary Attack Speed by 15% for 1.5 seconds, up to a maximum of 45%.

Biting Wind: Squall now empowers you and your Zephyrs for 5 seconds, causing your Dash skills to deal an additional 92% + 1303 damage to enemies and shatter their armor, increasing the damage they take by 5% stacking up to 30%

Thirsting Squall: Squall now causes you and your Zephyrs to dash forward, dealing 112% + 1586 damage to enemies in your path. If a Bleeding enemy is struck, they will take all remaining bleed damage instantly, refreshing Sqall's cooldown. You are immune to knockback during the dash.

Edge Dance: Squall now causes you to spin with your edges pulling in nearby enemies, dealing 60% + 851 damage and marking them. After 3 seconds, the mark erupts, dealing damage equal to 40% of the damage you dealt to them while they were marked
Squall now marks enemies for 3 seconds before it ruptures and slices through them dealing damage equal to 28.5% of the damage you dealt to them while marked
Squall also increases your damage by 8% for 5.7 seconds, stacking up to 3 times
Effect

Dancer's Chain: Blade Dance now throws your edges, impaling the into the first enemy they strike for 6 seconds, dealing 185% + 2609 damage and stunning them for 2 seconds. While your edges remain embedded in the target they cannot use dash skills and you can activate the skill again to dash behind the target dealing 101% +1436 damage to enemies along the path. You cannot be targeted during the dash.
Crimson Dance: Blade Dance now unleashes a circular wind blade, dealing 86% + 1210 damage and causing enemies to bleed for 16% +230 damage per second over 4 seconds

Sapping Wind: Blade Dance now throws your edges, impaling the into the first enemy they strike for 4 seconds, dealing 77% + 1088 damage while also sapping their power, decreasing their attack and movement speed by 30% and transferring that amount to you. If your blades remain embedded in the target for more than 2 seconds, they become stunned for 3 seconds
Trawl Dance: Blade Dance now pulls in all nearby enemies, dealing 90% + 1282 damage and preventing them from using dash skills for 3 seconds
Blade Dance also increases your Primary Attack damage by 16% for 3 seconds, stacking up to 32%
Blade Dance maximum charges increased by 1.
Blade Dance also increases your Critical Hit Chance by 19% for 3s whenit strikes an enemy

When Blade Dance hits an enemy it applies Wind Shackles for 3 seconds dealing 30% + 283 additional damage for every 5 attacks the enemy receives. Cannot occur more often than once every 0.3 seconds on the same enemy
Flood Locus: Cascade now conjures a Zephyr to slam the ground at a targeted location pulling waves into them dealing 97% + 1372 damage and pulling in nearby enemies

Converging Currents: Cascade now conjures converging currents around you dealing 136% + 1932 damage and knocking nearby enemies into the air. The damage and the radius of the currents is increased for every Zephyr you control up to a maximum of 203% + 2881 damage

Echoing Torrent: Cascade now empowers you and your Zephyrs attacks for 5 seconds, causing you to release waves at enemies you hit dealing 82% + 1159 damage to them and nearby enemies. Cannot occur more often than once every second
Fathomless Tide: Cascade now unleashes bursts of water from you and your Zephyrs dealing 74% + 1046 damage every 1 second for 5 seconds

Crushing Depths: Cascade now causes you and your Zephyrs to release a crushing wave dealing 102% + 1432 damage and stunning enemies for 3 seconds. Enemies suffering from the stun also take 30% additional damage from your next attack, removing the stun effect

Symphony of Water: Cascade now floods the ground, dealing 59% + 839 damage to enemies while empowering youand allies within, causing your skills to unleash waves that crash through enemies dealing 40% + 561 damage

Tide Pool: Cascade now unleashines crashing waves around you dealing 65% + 913 damage to all nearby enemies and leaving behind a Tide Pool. Enemies inside the pool have their Movement Speed reduced by 30%. If lightning damage is dealt within the pool it will be electrified and deal 91% + 1288 additional damage to all enemies within the pool (only once per second)

Geyser Ring: Cascade now slams your edges into the ground, dealing 60% + 851 damage to nearby enemies and causing up to 4 geysers to erupt from beneath their feet dealing 140% +  1990 additional damage and knocking them up. Cannot knock up the same target more often than once every 4 seconds.
Cascade cooldown is reduced by 18.6%
Cascade also causes enemies hit to become vulnerable taking 47.5% increased Critical Hit Damage for 4 seconds
Cascade also increases your Movement Speed by 40% for 3.8s when it hits an enemy.
Cascade also increases your Primary Attack Speed by 30% for 5.7s
Cascasde's Critical Hit Chance is increased by 38% against enemies below 50% life

Leading Strike: Flowing Strike now conjures a Zephyr that slashes enemies dealing 41% + 572 damage and stunning them for 2 seconds. You follow up the leading strike with a dash forward in a flourish of edge strikes dealing 106% + 1494 damage

Dispersion: Flowing Strike now causes you to dissipate into water, becoming briefly untragetable and upon reforming you conjure 2 Zephyrs and gain a shield that absorbs 195% +2756 damage for 4 seconds

Flash Point: Flowing Strike now hurls a bolt of lightning at a target dealing 87% + 1229 lightning damage and apllying a flash mark. Using the skill again will conjure 2 Zephyrs and together you all rush towards the flash mark and perform a powerful slash dealing 88% + 1236 lightning damage. Both the mark and the lightning slash will apply Shock status.

Fluid Movements: Flowing Strike now causes you to dash forward, dealing 66% + 935 damage to enemies in your path while also stunning them for 2 seconds., while also conjuring a Zephyr that deals 46% + 653 damage to all nearby enemies. If Flowing Strike lands a Critical Hit you will conjure an additional Zephyr

Usurper Strike: Flowing Strike now causes you to dash forward, dealing 200% + 2842 damage to enemies in your path. Hitting an enemy player will force them to turn their back to you and immobilize them for 3 seconds.
Flowing Strike now causes you to dash forward, conjuring several Zephyrs when you reach the end of your path.
Flowing Strike also grants you 19% increased damage for 3 seconds
Flowing Strike also grants you way of the water for 3 seconds, increasing the damage of your next skill cast by 48%
Flowing Strike conjures an additional Zephyr
Flowing Strike can now be used while siffering from Loss of Control and knockback effects, making you immune to their effects for 0,5 seconds
Flowing Strike also increases your Critical Hit Chance by 15,2% for 3 seconds
Flowing Strike also increases Skill damage by 12% for 3 seconds
Tidal Armor: Tidal Rush now commands a Zephyr you control to sacrifice itself for an ally to grant them a shield that absorbs 195% + 2625 damage and blocks projectiles
Tidal Crush: Tidal Rush now commands your Zephyrs to charge with you to a target location dealing 157% + 2122 damage and stunning enemies in your path for 2 seconds
Zephry Rush: Tidal Rush now conjures 3 Zephyrs around you that last 4 seconds

Dancing Rush: Tidal Rush now causes you to perform a sequence of dashes between up to 3 Zephyrs, rach dealing X% + Y damage to enemies along your path and launching 2 water blades at nearby enemies each dealing X% + Y damage. You are immune to loss of control and knockback while dashing.
Tidal Rush also increases your and your Zephyrs' Primary Attack damage by 28.5% for 2 seconds.
Tidal Rush also increases your Primary Attack Speed by 24% for 2 seconds.
Tidal Rush increases Skill damage by 6% per each nearby Zephyr for 3 seconds, up to a maximum of 18%.

Slayer Surge: Zephyr Surge now causes you to become untargetable and dash at an enemy unleashing 5 rapid strikes against them dealing 44% + 599 damage. Each Zephyr consumed grants 2 additional strikes and if your target dies before the assault ends, your Zephyrs will retun to your side and the cooldown will be reduced 70%

Blade of Silence: Zephyr Surge can now be charged to unleash a powerful slash of air dealing 162% + 2191 damage. Charging longer increases the damage by 10% up to a maximum of 100% with each Zephyr consumed also increasing the Critical Hit Chance of the Attack by 20%

Thunder Surge: Zephyr Surge now causes you to dash forward dealing 130% + 1756 lightning damage to enemies in your path. The dash will consume all active Zephyrs and each one consumed will grant another charge of the skill that must be used within 4 seconds. You are now untargetable during the dash, and exploiting Shock status with the dash will deal an additional 100% damage

Zephyr's Flurry: Zephy Surge now causes you to tumble away from your target as you throw 3 blades at them and other nearby enemies dealing 45% + 606 damage with each blade strike . When a blade lands a critical hit it will shatter in 2 striking the target again dealing 30% + 410 damage. Zephyr Surge also consumes all of your Zephyrs empowering the attack to throw 1 additional blade for each Zephyr consumed.

Slashing Surge: Zephyr Surge now consumes all Zephyrs and teleports you to a target location where you perform several slashes based on Zephyrs consumed (up to a maximum of 3) each dealing X% + Y damage. You are untargetable during this attack and all consumed Zephyrs return when it ends.
Zephy Surge deals 15.2% increased damage each time it strikes the same target up to a maximum of 76%
Zephyr Surge damage increases by 6% per Zephyr consumed for 3 seconds, up to a maximum of 18%.

Symphony of Wind: Wind Walk now empowers you, during which your Primary Attacks grant you a shield that absorbs damage and grants immunity to knockback effects. (Shield value equals 80% of your damage)
Chanting Wind: Wind Walk now creates an enchanted storm for 6 seconds, increasing your Evasion Rating by 30% and reducing all skill cooldowns by 2 seconds

Fume Step: Wind Walk now empowers you for 6 seconds during which every 6 yards moved conjures 3 wind slices that slash through random enemies dealing 83% + 1119 damage and slowing them reducing their Movement Speed by 40% for 4 seconds

Slicing Gale: Wind Walk now grants you Slicing Gale for 3 seconds making you invisible while also increasing your Movement Speed by 40% and your Critical Hit Chance by 40%. The bous Critical Hit Chance persists for 3 seconds after your invisibility ends
Wind Walk cooldown is reduced by 18,6%
Wind Walks Cooldown is reduced by 0.24 seconds each time you deal a Critical Hit but this cannot occur more often than 10 times every 9 seconds
Wind Walk duration is increased  by 28.5%
Wind Walk also removes all non-loss of control harmful effects

Rolling Blade: Rolling Surf now empowers your edges, granting you 1,5 seconds immunity to total loss of control and knockback while causing you and your Zephyrs' Primary Attacks to become sweeping sword slashes that deal increased damage with each consecutive hit. (5% increased Primary Attack damage, up to a maximum of 50%)

Rolling Whip: Rolling Surf now empowers your edges for 6 seconds, causing you and your Zephyrs Primary Attacks to become swirling whip strikes dealing 98% + 1393 damage. Additionally your Movement Speed is increased by 35% and you ride a wave allowing you to rush towards enemies and use Primary Attacks while moving

Rolling Whip: Rolling Surf now empowers your edges for 6 seconds, causing you and your Zephyrs Primary Attacks to throw water daggers that return to you dealing 38% + 537 damage to enemies they strike. While active each use of a skill or Primary Attack grants you an additional dagger for each throw, up to a maximum of 4. Additionally your Movement Speed is increased by 35% and you ride a wave allowing you to rush towards enemies and use Primary Attacks while moving, but your Movement Speed is reduced by 25% when attacking.

Backbreaker Bolts: Rolling Surf now empowers your next 5 Primary Attacks to fire Backbreaker Bolts each dealing 100% + 1416 damage. Bolts that hit an enemy from behind will increase by 100% + 1416 additional damage, stacking for each successive bolt
Rolling Surf also conjures 1 Zephyr
Rolling Surf Critical Hits cause an explosion of water dealing 41% + 369 damage to nearby enemies
Rolling Surf also increases the damage of the next 5 Primary Attacks within 3 seconds by 48%
Forceful Tide: Riptide now calls a wave that crashes into you, dealing 135% + 1908 damage while also pulling in and stunning enemies for 2 seconds

High Tide: Riptide now generates energy while you move, and once full you can activate it to dash forward on a wave dealing 170% + 2411 damage to all enemies in your path and knocking them back. Cannot cause knockback more often than once every 5 seconds. You must have full energy to activate the skill.
Churntide: Riptide now surrounds you and your Zephyrs with swirling tides for 4 seconds, dealing 80% + 1128 damage per second to nearby enemies
If Riptide inflicts loss of control or knockback on an enemy, the damage they take is incereased by 19% for 3 seconds
Riptide increases your damage done by 7.6% for 3 seconds, for each enemy hit up to a maximum of 22.8%

Storm Maker: Stormfury now empowers only you for 6 seconds, causing every 3 Primary Attacks to release a violent Storm around your target dealing 86% + 1273 damage and pulling in nearby enemies. Cannot pull the same enemy player more often than once every 5 seconds

Hunter's Wind: Stormfury now engulfs an enemy in wind, dealing 104% + 1539 damage and knocking them airborne and marking them for 4 seconds. when the marked target is struck 3 times they burst dealing 41% + 604 damage to all nearby enemies
Eye of Fury: Stormfury now calls a lightning storm to follow you for 5 seconds , striking random enemies with lightning every second, each bolt dealing 76% + 1122 lightning damage to nearby enemies

Hurricane Eye: Stormfury now empowers you, surrounding you  with swirling, shredding winds for 4 seconds, increasing your movement speed by 30% and continually pulling in nearby enemies each second dealing 52% + 765 damage

Stinging Fury: Stormfury now empowers you and your Zephyrs for 5 seconds, during which Primary Attacks stack Wind Marks on enemies for 3 seconds when dealing damage. Marked enemies will take additional 120% + 728 damage every 3 stacks. The same ememy can only take this damage once every 0.35 seconds

Stormfury also increases your Primary Attack Speed by 5% when it strikes an enemy, stacking up to 6 times (this item is bugged: you can equip it without the skill an it will work as long as you have 1 "Crosswinds" Eternal Affix on any Gear Piece
When Stormfury deals damage, it increases your Critical Hit Chance by 7.6% for 3 seconds, up to a maximum of 22.8%
